entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
